<h2>Introduction</h2>
<p>
  setting up an instance of OHDSI using Polites follows the following basic steps. 
  <ul>
    <li>
      Install the prerequisites.  This includes the following.  
      <ul>
        <li>
          Java version 8 and 11
        </li>
        <li>
          A git client
        </li>
        <li>
          Microsoft SqlServer
        </li>
        <li>
          Docker
        </li>
      </ul>
      Most of these prerequisites can be installed using 
      <a href="https://www.dropbox.com/s/lsfz9gf4r0pokv2/YesPolitesInstaller-1.0.015.exe?dl=1">YesPolitesInstaller.exe</a>
    </li>
    <li>
      Install, Configure and Run Broadsea
    </li>
    <li>
      Install and Configure Polites<br/>
      The Polites application can be downloaded from 
      <a href="https://www.dropbox.com/s/s4u7rzeqodk788i/polites-1.0.018.zip?dl=1">here</a>.
    </li>
    <li>
      Run Polites
    </li>
  </ul>
</p>
